name: test_agent_run_sudo
description:
arrange: given a jenkins-agent-k8s charm.
    act: Check if the _daemon_ user is allowed to run sudo commands.
    assert: the _daemon_ user has the correct sudo privileges.
descriptionHtml:
arrange: given a jenkins-agent-k8s charm.
act: Check if the _daemon_ user is allowed to run sudo commands.
assert: the _daemon_ user has the correct sudo privileges.
